name: BucketPolicy
description: The AWS::S3::BucketPolicy type applies an Amazon S3 bucket policy to an Amazon S3 bucket.

properties.name: Bucket
properties.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that the policy applies to.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.description: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified bucket. For more information, see Access Policy Language Overview in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.
